title: Forecast Project Cost at Completion
description: A project controls engineer needs to update the Estimate at Completion (EAC) for the project based on the latest performance data.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current budget, the actual costs to date, and the earned value for the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully gathers all necessary financial data.

tasks.description: Calculate the Cost Performance Index (CPI) for the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the CPI to be 0.95, indicating the project is slightly over budget.

tasks.description: Use the CPI to calculate the new EAC, and update the project's financial forecast.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the new EAC and updates the official project forecast.
